survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding plant-based dairy alternatives, including purchase frequency, preferred brands, and factors influencing their choices.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover a broad range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?

questions.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for additional inputs.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based dairy alternatives compared to traditional dairy products?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who consume plant-based dairy alternatives (Q1 not 'Rarely or never')
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the question is skipped for non-consumers.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based dairy alternatives compared to traditional dairy products?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who consume plant-based dairy alternatives (Q1 not 'Rarely or never')

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who consume plant-based dairy alternatives (Q1 not 'Rarely or never')
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
